basic.description: This course examines disability and physical activity across a range of settings from recreation to competitive sport. Topics to be covered will include: accessibility; disability sport; inclusive physical activity opportunities; and fitness and training for persons with disabilities.
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: Physical Activity for Persons with Disabilities

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 3 or above and [(reg in a PHED or KINE Plan and KNPE237 or PPHE237) or (registration in a HLTH Major or Medial Plan and KNPE336 or KNPE436)].
